item.title: Most Iconic Video Game Weapons
item.description:
Highlights

  • Wield iconic video game arms like the Energy Sword and Master Sword, legendary weapons that carved their mark in gaming history.
  • Embrace the power of the Leviathan Axe and Gravity Gun, iconic armaments redefining the gameplay experience with their unique abilities.
  • Venture through gaming history and witness the enduring legacy of video game weapons like the BFG9000 and Mega Buster.

Certain weapons have transcended their virtual boundaries in video games to become iconic symbols of gaming history. These weapons are more than mere destruction tools; they have left an indelible mark on players and pop culture, from swords that have vanquished evil for generations to futuristic blasters that have redefined sci-fi warfare.

Explore the most iconic video game weapons and delve into the stories and significance behind these legendary armaments. From the BFG9000's earth-shattering power in the world of Doom to the Master Sword's timeless quest in The Legend of Zelda series, each weapon has a unique tale to tell. Venture through gaming history and pay homage to the weapons that have become symbols of skill, courage, and the enduring spirit of gaming.

Updated June 8, 2024 by Ritwik Mitra: There are many video games with amazing weapons that are a blast to use, to the point where the look and impact of these weapons become quite legendary in their own right. In fact, some of these weapons have become facets of pop culture that a lot of people recognize.

Some of the best video game weapons do a great job of communicating the power and effectiveness they hold in no time, letting players grow attached to the armaments they use to show enemies who's boss across a bevy of fun video games.

1 Leviathan Axe

A Weapon Given To Kratos By His Wife, Faye

The new iteration of the God of War everyone knew and loved was a blast to experience, with Kratos trying to be a good father while doing justice to Faye's legacy. His loving Giant wife gave him a valuable gift in the form of the Leviathan Axe, which is a frost-imbued weapon that hits for serious damage.

This weapon takes a while to get used to but becomes an enduring facet of Kratos' arsenal in no time. It cleaves enemies with ease and freezes them to hit for major damage, with the functionality of this weapon further enhanced in Ragnarok . Players love using this weapon along with the Blades of Chaos, causing devastating damage and leaving enemies floundering to survive in no time.

2 Gravity Gun

Showed Just How Advanced Valve's Physics Engine Was

The Gravity Gun was pretty much a flex from Valve who wanted to show just how ahead of its time Half-Life 2 was when this amazing FPS launched. The physics present in this title was amazing to behold and still blows many minds to this day. To make sure that players realized just how amazing this system was, they were allowed to toy around with a weapon that let them manipulate objects in the environment for both combat and puzzles.

With an iconic design coupled with some fun gameplay implementations, it's easy to see why the Gravity Gun made such a strong impression in the minds of most fans. Even after all the innovations that have happened in the gaming industry since then, the sheer joy players experience while using this iconic weapon is unmatched.

3 Fat Man

Shoots Out A Mini Nuke That Does Massive Damage

This nuclear device is a treat for Fallout fans who love what this series brings to the table. Ever since the first entry, the ludicrous nature of the post-apocalypse coupled with a gritty aesthetic is a huge reason why players love this franchise to bits. With the Fallout TV adaptation making waves, it's easy to see why interest in this IP is higher than ever before.

When players get their hands on the iconic Fat Man, they have no idea what's in store for them. This weapon uses the rare mini-nuke ammunition to unleash small atomic blasts that obliterate everything in sight, including the player if they happen to be within the general radius of said explosion. It's a ridiculous weapon that has become iconic in the eyes of Fallout fans, and for good reason.

4 Energy Sword

Meleeing Opponents With This Weapon Was A Sign Of The Utmost Disrespect

The energy sword's design is unmistakably Halo , and its unique appearance sets it apart as one of the most memorable weapons in the franchise. Its status as a one-hit kill in standard situations and its swift attack make it a formidable choice on the battlefield, filling opponents with fear as they try to keep their distance. Despite its range limitations, players have found creative ways to close the gap and use the Energy Sword to rack up kills, making it a fan-favorite choice for those who relish a more stealthy and predatory play style.

Beyond its gameplay effectiveness, the Energy Sword also holds sentimental value for fans due to its association with the beloved character, the Arbiter. Its return in Halo 2 and availability to both Master Chief and the Arbiter solidified its popularity, becoming a symbol of the franchise's rich lore and universe. As a result, the Energy Sword has become an iconic and legendary weapon in video games, leaving a lasting impact on players and contributing to the allure and mystique of the Halo series.

5 Rebellion

Dante's Imposing Presence Would Be Incomplete Without A Weapon That Holds Great Significance

The Rebellion carries significant lore within the game Beyond its gameplay significance. It holds emotional and symbolic importance as a keepsake from Dante's heroic father, the legendary Dark Knight Sparda. Rebellion played a crucial role in unlocking Dante's demonic potential and granting him the awe-inspiring Devil Trigger ability, making it a pivotal element in the protagonist's journey.

Moreover, It is not just a sword but a representation of the game's identity, and Dante himself would only be complete with it adorning his back. Rebellion has become a beloved constant throughout the series, solidifying it as one of the most memorable and legendary weapons in action games. Its iconic status is a testament to the enduring legacy and impact of the Devil May Cry series on gaming.

6 The Master Sword

A Sword That Has Stood The Test Of Time To Become Link's Strongest And Most Iconic Weapon

Created by the goddess Hylia, Master Sword is said to be wieldable only by a hero with the purest of hearts, adding to its legendary status. Known by various names, such as The Blade of Evilâ€™s Bane and the Sword that Seals the Darkness, the weapon has become synonymous with Link's quest to combat the forces of Ganon and save the Kingdom of Hyrule.

The sword's presence in various Zelda games, its association with Link's heroic journey, and its embodiment of hope and salvation for Hyrule make it a beloved and iconic gaming weapon. Its enduring presence in the series since its debut in 1986 has solidified its iconic status. As players continue to wield this legendary blade, Master Sword remains an enduring symbol of courage and strength in video games.

7 Blades Of Chaos

Twin Swords Attached To Chains That Rip And Tear Enemies To Shreds

Forged by the God of War, Ares, as a gift and reminder of Kratos' servitude, the Blades played a pivotal role in his rise to power. They allowed him to defeat the god and set in motion the events that led to his rise to become the God of War himself. The Blades' involvement in his transformation from a mortal to a god and their use in taking down divine beings cement their status as one of the best video game weapons ever.

While the Leviathan Axe may emerge as another iconic weapon in the series, the original Blades of Chaos hold a special place in the hearts of fans. Their brutal appearance and role in shaping Kratos' destiny make them unforgettable symbols of the God of War series. The Blades of Chaos will forever be remembered as a powerful and iconic weapon that defines Kratos and his epic journey.

8 Keyblade

A Ridiculous-Looking Weapon That Has Somehow Become One Of The Most Iconic Blades In Gaming History

Sora's Kingdom Key, the most recognized Keyblade, was the first to appear in the series and intricately linked to his character. Beyond its combat functionality, the weapon's role in unlocking and locking the Keyholes of different worlds adds depth to the game's narrative and gameplay mechanics. This ability allows Sora and his friends to access new worlds while preventing the heartless from gaining access to the heart of those worlds.

The weapon is a fusion of Disney's lightheartedness and Square Enix's extravagant style, showcasing the perfect blend of elements that define the Kingdom Hearts series. It serves as an effective melee weapon and a tool for unlocking worlds but also channels magic, making it a jack of all trades and master of everything it does. Its unique and absurd appearance perfectly encapsulates the whimsical and imaginative nature of the game itself. Despite its seemingly ridiculous concept, the Keyblade works flawlessly in execution, making it a beloved and popular video game weapon.

9 Hidden Blade

The Coolest Way To Assassinate Enemies In Any Video Game

The Hidden Blade, a symbol of the Brotherhood, is synonymous with the Assassin's Creed series and is favored by many protagonists. This retractable blade remains hidden on the wrist until its lethal purpose is revealed, making it ideal for stealthy assassinations. Despite the introduction of other weapons, the Hidden Blade remains a beloved and essential part of the game.

Since its debut in the original game in 2007, the Hidden Blade has been a constant feature in the series, except for Assassin's Creed Odyssey . Over the years, it has evolved into upgraded versions that serve in stealth assassinations and combat situations. This iconic weapon has profoundly impacted gaming culture, defining the essence of the Assassin's Creed franchise.

10 BFG9000

No Enemy Can Stand A Single Blast From This OP Weapon

The BFG9000 from the Doom series is an iconic and beloved weapon among players. Standing for "Big F****** Gun," it lives up to its name by taking up a significant portion of the screen when equipped. When fired, it releases a gigantic green orb of death that brings joy to the wielder and annihilates enemies in its path.

This powerful weapon is synonymous with the essence of the game, embodying the joy of destruction and the thrill of wiping out hordes of enemies. Its reputation as a "horrible hallway scouring weapon" that turns foes into puddles of gore adds to its legendary status, making it the holy grail of Doom weapons that excites players and makes them feel like total badasses. The BFG9000 is a titan of FPS butchery, and its association with the series has solidified its place as an iconic and treasured gaming weapon.

11 The Mega Buster

The Most Reliable Weapon That Mega Man Starts With In His Games

The Mega Buster is an iconic and versatile weapon in the Mega Man series. It has been a part of Mega Man's left hand since the first game and has evolved in power over time. Originally only capable of shooting tiny pellets, it later became the Super Mega Buster, allowing for charged shots and increased firepower. The Mega Buster serves as a base shell for modification, enabling Mega Man to acquire and utilize various weapon types from defeated robot masters. This evolution from a humble, lemon-shooting sentient to an almighty arsenal-wielding robot overlord is crucial to the gameplay experience.

The Mega Buster's ability to expand in power with items like the metal blade or fire wave makes it an unstoppable killing machine capable of attacking enemies in multiple directions. This versatility provides for tactical platforming, setting the Mega Ma n series apart from other games. The Mega Buster's significance lies in its central role as the foundation of Mega Man's weaponry and the diverse gameplay experiences it enables. As a result, it has earned its place as one of the greatest video game weapons of all time.

12 Soul Edge

A Dark, Sinister Weapon That Has Played A Central Role Across This Celebrated Fighting Series

The Soul Edge is an iconic weapon in the Soulcalibur series, known as "The Evil Sword," and a driving force behind the entire franchise. Possessing seemingly unlimited power, the blade gains strength by consuming the souls of the fallen. Among the many who have wielded it, Nightmare, the Azure Knight, stands out as the most prominent user, with the sword taking the form of a giant blade with a menacing eyeball.

The weapon's malevolence is so profound that even its spirit, Inferno, becomes a separate entity, seeking to destroy Soul Calibur and the world. The Soul Edge's dark and powerful presence has made it an enduring symbol of evil within the series and an Iconic weapon in the video game industry.

13 Buster Sword

A Massive, Impractical Blade Wielded By A Man Whose Lanky Figure Makes This Act Hard To Believe

The Buster Sword is easily the most iconic weapon in Final Fantasy , a series known for having over-the-top weapons. Cloud Strife wields this blade after being given the same by Zack Fair in an emotional scene that is expanded upon in Crisis Core .

This weapon is further enhanced in Advent Children , where the blade splits apart into smaller swords. This makes the final Omnislash against Sephiroth look even more dazzling and further cements the Buster Sword's legacy as one of the greatest video game blades of all time.

14 Vampire Killer

A Whip That Puts Enemies In Its Place Once Players Get The Hang Of Using It

The Vampire Killer whip, an iconic weapon in the Castlevania series, is the heirloom of the Belmont clan, bestowed with power and destiny to smite the incarnation of evil, Dracula. Despite being overshadowed by other weapons in the series' evolution, it remains an essential symbol of the heroic legacy of the Belmonts. Super Castlevania IV enhanced its appeal with versatile attacks in eight directions, adding to the fun of wielding it.

Despite the challenging platformer gameplay, mastering the whip with precision and skill brings immense satisfaction. As players traverse the castle, the Vampire Killer becomes a timeless representation of the struggle between good and evil in the Castlevania series.

15 Gunblade

Somehow, A Revolver And Sword's Combination Makes For An Incredibly Iconic Weapon

There's no denying that Squall's Gunblade is an impractical weapon, but players who love this game don't care. Striking a critical hit by pressing the trigger button at the right time never ceases to be satisfying as Squall slices and shoots the enemy at the same time.

Players unlock bigger and better weapons as the game progresses, but nothing comes close to the ludicrousness of Squall's base weapon. It's a testament to the brilliance of the designers to make sure that every Final Fantasy game looks and feels unique.

item.title: Roblox: Death Ball Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Death Ball Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Death Ball
  • Where to Find More Death Ball Codes

It's often said that imitation is the sincerest form of flattery, in which case, the developers of Death Ball must really like Blade Ball . The two games are incredibly similar, although many Roblox players now seem to prefer the former, finding its gameplay to be a lot more exciting than what's on offer in the original.

As is the case in Blade Ball , there are plenty of Death Ball codes that players can redeem for free Gems and other great rewards. Roblox players should be sure to redeem these codes as soon as possible though, as the game is updated often, which can lead to codes expiring at a moment's notice.

Updated June 8, 2024, by Tom Bowen: As a result of the game's lead dev working hard on another project (Anime Defenders), Death Ball hasn't received any meaningful new content as of late. Unfortunately, this extends to Death Ball codes, with none having been released since the beginning of the year. Thankfully, however, there are still two working codes for Death Ball, which new players can redeem to get their hands on 8,000 free Gems. Players who've already redeemed codes jiro and xmas should be sure to check back here soon, as we'll continue to search for new Death Ball codes and will update this guide as soon as we find some.

All Death Ball Codes

Working Death Ball Codes

  • jiro - Redeem this code for 4,000 Gems
  • xmas - Redeem this code for 4,000 Gems

Expired Death Ball Codes

  • 100mil
  • derank
  • mech
  • newyear
  • divine
  • foxuro
  • kameki
  • thankspity
  • launch
  • sorrygems
  • spirit

How to Redeem Codes for Death Ball

The process for redeeming Death Ball codes is relatively straightforward and not too dissimilar from redeeming codes in other Roblox games. However, those having trouble can refer to the step-by-step instructions below to help speed up the process.

  1. Launch Death Ball .
  2. Press the "More" button at the top of the screen.
  3. Select "Codes" from the drop-down menu.
  4. Type or paste the code into the box provided and then press "Verify". Alternatively, players can just hit enter.

Where to Find More Death Ball Codes

Players can find new codes for Death Ball in a few different places. For starters, it's a good idea to join the game's official Discord server, both for new codes and information about the game. Players should also follow Sub on Twitter, as they sometimes tweet about the game. However, the best place to find new Death Ball codes is arguably right here, as this guide will be updated regularly as and when new codes become available. As such, it's a good idea to bookmark this page and check back here often so as to avoid missing out on future freebies.

FAQ

Q: What is the newest code in Death Ball?

The newest Death Ball code is jiro , which can be redeemed for 4,000 Gems.

item.title: Roblox: Peroxide Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Peroxide Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Peroxide
  • How to Get More Peroxide Codes
  • Peroxide Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Peroxide

There are plenty of great Roblox games that are inspired by manga and anime, but few, if any, are quite as good as Peroxide . As its name suggests, it's based on Tite Kubo's Bleach and offers players an incredibly enjoyable combat experience that Ichigo himself would be proud of. As in most other Roblox games, that experience can become even better with the help of Peroxide codes.

Players can redeem Peroxide codes to claim a ridiculous amount of free Product Essences, which they can then take to Kisuke in The City to get rerolls on every individual path. Product Essences can also be used to acquire cosmetic items, which is why fans of the game are always on the lookout for all of the latest Peroxide codes.

Updated June 8, 2024, by Tom Bowen: New Peroxide codes used to be added to the game all the time. Sadly, however, that's no longer the case. It's been weeks now since the last new code, much to the dismay of many players. Thankfully, there are still plenty of working codes for Peroxide, meaning that new players can get a pretty decent amount of Product Essences right from the get-go. After redeeming these codes, it's a good idea to bookmark this page and check back here often, as we'll be adding new Peroxide codes to the list below as soon as we find them.

How to Redeem Codes in Peroxide

As with similar Roblox games, the process of redeeming codes in Peroxide is relatively straightforward and does not require much knowledge or effort on the player's part. Even so, those having trouble can find step-by-step instructions on how to claim in-game rewards listed below:

  • First, it is necessary to launch Peroxide .
  • Then, if players are entering the game for the first time, they'll need to go through the tutorial.
  • Once the tutorial has been completed, in the upper left part of the screen, players should find and select the start button. It is located to the right of the chat button.
  • In the resulting menu, players should type or paste any of the active Peroxide codes listed above and then press Enter.

How to Get More Peroxide Codes

To get more Peroxide codes, players can subscribe to the developer's official Discord server, where they'll find news and updates about the game. However, the best solution is to bookmark this article, as it is updated every month.

Peroxide Tips and Tricks

Below, players will find some tips and tricks for Peroxide :

Shikai Unlocking

  • Reach level 15 as a Soul Reaper by completing quests on the board.
  • For additional Hollows to defeat, visit Wake Up Mundo. It will cost 200 in-game currency.
  • Enhance stats by going to the gym near Kisuke or using agility boards.
  • After reaching level 15, meditate to unlock the Shikai.
  • Achieve B rank to use Shikai infinitely.

Resurrection Unlocking

  • Resurrection is automatically unlocked at level 15.

Use Crystals

  • Collect time relics to purchase crystals, which will enhance abilities.
  • Crystals can grant additional effects to attacks, such as setting enemies on fire.

Optimizing Stat Builds

  • Focus on combat stats rather than support stats.
  • Players need to choose stats based on their desired playstyle, whether it's a strength, vitality, or ability build.

The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Peroxide

Each game is special in its own way and offers an interesting gaming experience. That is why it is always fun for players to try something new. To that end, below is a list of the five best anime games like Peroxide :

  • Project Slayers
  • Anime Adventures
  • Blox Fruits
  • Titan Warfare
  • Type Soul

item.title: Roblox: Fruit Seas Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Fruit Seas Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Fruit Seas

Fruit Seas (formerly Demon Piece ) is another Roblox game inspired by the popular anime One Piece . Compared to most of the others though, it is much better designed and more enjoyable. In this RPG adventure, your goal is to become the best among other players, and the path to the objective is very difficult and thorny.

Hundreds of enemies and bosses will stand in your way, and if you are not well-leveled, it is unlikely that you can confront them. However, by redeeming Fruit Seas codes, you can provide yourself with a decent amount of currency and boosters that will help you progress through the game much faster.

Updated June 8, 2024, by Tom Bowen: New Fruit Seas codes have been a little hard to come by lately, despite the game hitting the most recent likes goal set by the lead dev. With Update 2 now looming large on the horizon, though, one suspects that some new codes will be added fairly soon. Players should be sure to check back here often so as to avoid missing out once they are, as many of the redeem codes for Fruit Seas expire after just a couple of days. In the meantime, there are still some working Fruit Seas codes that new players can enjoy.

All Fruit Seas Codes

Working Fruit Seas Codes

  • BUGFIXES - Redeem this code to get Double Drops for 15 minutes.
  • SHUTDOWN - Redeem this code to get Double Mastery for 15 minutes.
  • ITSFINALLYHERE - Redeem this code to get Double Beli for 20 minutes.
  • LUCKYRACE? - Redeem this code to get a free Race Reroll.
  • FRESHSTART - Redeem this code to get a free Stat Reset.

Expired Fruit Seas Codes

  • UPDATETIME - Redeem this code to get Double Experience for 20 minutes.
  • 75KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Double Beli for 25 minutes.
  • 70KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Double Drops for 20 minutes.
  • 60KLIKES - Redeem this code to get a free Stat Reset.
  • 50KLIKES1 - Redeem this code to get Double Beli for 15 minutes.
  • 50KLIKES2 - Redeem this code to get a free Race Reroll.
  • 40KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Double Mastery for 20 minutes.
  • 35KLIKES - Redeem this code to get a free Stat Reset.
  • 30KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Double Drops for 15 minutes.
  • QUICKFIXES - Redeem this code to get a free Race Reroll.
  • 6MVISITS - Redeem this code to get Double Beli for 20 minutes.
  • 25KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Double Mastery for 20 minutes.
  • 20KLIKES - Redeem this code to get a free Stat Reset.
  • SORRY4SHUTDOWN - Redeem this code to get Double Drops for 20 minutes.
  • 15KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Double Beli for 20 minutes.
  • 2MVISITS - Redeem this code to get Double Mastery for 20 minutes.
  • 12KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Double Experience for 20 minutes.
  • 10KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Double Mastery for 20 minutes.
  • 25KMEMBERS - Redeem this code to get Double Drops for 15 minutes.
  • 1MVISITS - Redeem this code to get a free Stat Reset.
  • 750KVISITS - Redeem this code to get Double Mastery for 15 minutes.
  • NEWFIXES - Redeem this code to get Double Beli for 20 minutes.
  • 500KVISITS - Redeem this code to get Double Drops for 15 minutes.
  • 7KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Double Experience for 20 minutes.
  • 5KLIKES - Redeem this code to get a free Stat Reset.
  • SORRYFORLAG - Redeem this code to get 100,000 Beli.
  • PERFORMANCEFIX - Redeem this code to get Double Experience for 30 minutes.
  • 300KVISITS - Redeem this code to get Double Drops for 10 minutes.
  • 3KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Double Mastery for 10 minutes.
  • DEMONTIMING - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Beli.
  • FOLLOWTWITTER - Redeem this code to get a free Stat Reset.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 2 Mastery Boosts for 15 minutes.

How to Redeem Codes for Fruit Seas

Redeeming Fruit Seas codes is not a difficult process. Fortunately, there are no restrictions or tutorials in the game, so you'll have access to this option as soon as you launch the title. So, if you're a beginner and have never redeemed codes in a Roblox game before, or if you just forgot how to do it, below is a detailed guide:

  • Launch Fruit Seas .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be a white button with black dashes on the icon above your HP and stamina, and you should click on it.
  • After doing so, you will open a side menu with several more buttons. Among them, find and interact with the settings button with a gear on the icon.
  • In the settings menu, in the lower section, you will see an input field. Here you need to enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the active codes listed above.
  • Once you've done that, press Enter to submit your reward request. If you have done everything correctly, REDEEMED! will be highlighted in green in the input field, and the rewards will be added to your inventory or balance.

This way, you will need to redeem every active code if you want to receive all the available rewards. Try to redeem all codes as soon as possible, as each code has an expiration date after which you will no longer be able to receive these rewards.

item.title: Roblox: Jujutsu Shenanigans Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Jujutsu Shenanigans Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Jujutsu Shenanigans

There are plenty of great Roblox games inspired by Jujutsu Kaisen , but few have made quite as big an impression as Jujutsu Shenanigans . Featuring several JJK characters and a plethora of powers and abilities from the anime, this combat-focused battlegrounds game has taken the community by storm and continues to grow at an impressive pace.

Given the game's immense and ever-growing popularity, it should come as no surprise to learn that there is also a huge demand for Jujutsu Shenanigans codes. Roblox players can redeem codes for Jujutsu Shenanigans by visiting the Rewards section of the shop menu, though before they can do that, they'll first need to find them, which they can do just by scrolling down the page.

Updated June 8, 2024, by Tom Bowen: Despite the game being played by hundreds of thousands of people every week, new Jujutsu Shenanigans codes are incredibly hard to come by, making them a whole lot more meaningful when they do eventually show up. Sadly, there hasn't been a new one for quite some time now, but with the game fast approaching a quarter of a billion visits, there's a pretty good chance of that changing fairly soon. With this in mind, it's a good idea to bookmark this page and check back here from time to time, as we'll be sure to add new codes for Jujutsu Shenanigans whenever we find them.

All Jujutsu Shenanigans Codes

Working Jujutsu Shenanigans Codes

  • There are currently no active codes for Jujutsu Shenanigans .

Expired Jujutsu Shenanigans Codes

  • 120MVISITS - 200 Cash + Free Party Emote
  • 20MVISITS - 200 Cash

How to Redeem Codes for Jujutsu Shenanigans

Redeeming codes in Jujutsu Shenanigans is fairly straightforward when compared to some other Roblox games. Players will simply need to press a few buttons and then type or paste in the code that they want to use. Most should be able to figure it all out for themselves, but for those having trouble, the following step-by-step instructions should help:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Jujutsu Shenanigans .
  2. Click on the shop icon at the top of the screen.
  3. Navigate to the Rewards tab of the shop menu.
  4. Type or paste the code into the Code box and then press Enter in order to redeem it.
